title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7904.3 - Time for appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7904.3 - Time for appeal

State Regulations
(a) An appeal
from an assignment order issued pursuant to Parts 7901 and 7903 of this
subchapter, or from a general distribution order issued pursuant to Parts 7902
and 7903 of this subchapter, must be taken within five business days of service
upon the appellant of the order being appealed. (b) An appeal from a denial order issued
pursuant to Parts 7901 and 7903 of this subchapter must be taken within 15 days
of service upon the appellant of the order being appealed. (c) An appeal shall be deemed taken when a
written petition is filed by personal delivery, or by postage-paid certified
mail, to the commissioner, State Energy Office, 2 Rockefeller Plaza, Albany, New York 12223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7904.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
